data.title: Trailer Hitch Installation: CURT 13020 GMC Jimmy
data.tags: CURT Receiver Hitch, trailer hitch, towing, how to install, curt 13020, GMC Jimmy, Envoy, Chevy Trailblazer, Oldsmobile Bravada
data.description:
This video depicts the installation of the CURT 13020 Class 3 Trailer hitch on a 1996 GMC Jimmy. 

Install Sheet - https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/13020/installsheet/CM_13020_INS.PDF

Application Coverage:
1994-2004 GMC Jimmy
1999-2000 Chevy Envoy 
1999-2001 Chevy Trailblazer 
1995-2004 Oldsmobile Bravada 

Special Notes:
***DO NOT EXCEED VEHICLE MANUFACTURER'S RECOMMENDED TOWING CAPACITY***
PERIODICALLY CHECK THIS RECEIVER HITCH TO ENSURE THAT ALL FASTENERS
ARE TIGHT AND THAT ALL STRUCTURAL COMPONENTS ARE SOUND.

Warning:
-This video is intended to be used as reference. Please refer to print instructions for complete installation information.

data.title: Trailer Wiring Install: CURT 56046 on 2007 Chevrolet Impala
data.tags: CURT Receiver Hitch, trailer hitch, towing, how to install, curt 56406, Chevy Impala
data.description:
This video depicts the installation of the CURT 56046 T-Connector on a 2007 Chevrolet Impala.

Install Sheet:
https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/56046/installsheet/CME_56046_INS.PDF

Application Coverage:
2006 - 2012

Special Notes:
All Steps must be followed to ensure correct function of the T-Connector.  To verify proper installation once installed, test by connecting a test light or properly wired trailer.

Warning:
-This video is intended to be used as reference. Please refer to print instructions for complete installation information.

data.title: Trailer Hitch Install: CURT 15015 on 1994 Chevrolet K3500 Pickup
data.tags: CURT Receiver Hitch, trailer hitch, towing, how to install, curt 15015, Chevy C/K3500
data.description:
This video depicts the installation of the CURT 15015 class V trailer hitch on a 1994 Chevrolet K3500 Pickup.

Install Sheet - https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/15015/installsheet/CM_15015_INS.PDF


Application Coverage:
1988 - 2000 Chevrolet Full Size Pickups* (1500, 2500, 3500)
1988 - 2000 GMC Full Size Pickups* (1500, 2500, 3500)

*See http://curtmfg.com/part/15015#tab=vehicles for exceptions for pickups with/without dual exhaust.

Special Notes:
***DO NOT EXCEED VEHICLE MANUFACTURER'S RECOMMENDED TOWING CAPACITY***
PERIODICALLY CHECK THIS RECEIVER HITCH TO ENSURE THAT ALL FASTENERS
ARE TIGHT AND THAT ALL STRUCTURAL COMPONENTS ARE SOUND.
*** USE EXISTING VEHICLE HARDWARE ***

Warning:
-This video is intended to be used as reference. Please refer to print instructions for complete installation information.

data.title: Trailer Wiring Install: CURT 56070 on Chevrolet Silverado 3500 HD
data.tags: CURT Trailer wiring, gooseneck wiring install, trailer hitch, how to install, curt 56070, Ford F-150, F150
data.description:
This video depicts the installation of the CURT 56070 5th Wheel/Gooseneck OEM wiring Extension on a 2013 Chevrolet Silverado 3500 HD.

Install Sheet:
https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/56070/installsheet/CME_56070_INS.PDF

Special Notes:
All Steps must be followed to ensure correct function of the T-Connector.  To verify proper installation once installed, test by connecting a test light or properly wired trailer.

data.description:
This video depicts the installation of the CURT 13371 class III trailer hitch on a 2013 Ford F-150.

Install Sheet - https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/13371/installsheet/CM_13371_INS.PDF

No Drilling Required

Application Coverage:
2009 - 2013 Ford F-150

Special Notes:
***DO NOT EXCEED VEHICLE MANUFACTURER'S RECOMMENDED TOWING CAPACITY***
PERIODICALLY CHECK THIS RECEIVER HITCH TO ENSURE THAT ALL FASTENERS
ARE TIGHT AND THAT ALL STRUCTURAL COMPONENTS ARE SOUND.
*** USE EXISTING VEHICLE HARDWARE ***

Warning:
-This video is intended to be used as reference. Please refer to print instructions for complete installation information.

data.title: CURT Trailer Hitch Installation Techniques
data.tags: CURT Trailer hitch, receiver hitch, installation, tips, how to install a trailer hitch
data.description:
How to Install a CURT Trailer Hitch.  This video goes through 5 useful techniques that you may encounter when installing a CURT Trailer hitch.  

The 5 techniques included:

Weldnut Cleaning
Fishwiring
Lowering Exhaust
Frame Drilling
Fascia Trimming

Learning these 5 techniques will give you the knowledge and ability to install any CURT Trailer Hitch!

asset.title: CURT Trailer Hitch Installation Techniques
asset.description:
How to Install a CURT Trailer Hitch.  This video goes through 5 useful techniques that you may encounter when installing a CURT Trailer hitch.  

The 5 techniques included:

Weldnut Cleaning
Fishwiring
Lowering Exhaust
Frame Drilling
Fascia Trimming

Learning these 5 techniques will give you the knowledge and ability to install any CURT Trailer Hitch!

For more information, check us out at http://www.curtmfg.com

BRING IT!
asset.author: CURT Manufacturing
